creditline: Gift of Elizabeth, Julie, and Catherine Andrus in memory of John and Marion Andrus
description: scene in front of exterior of barn or old house: figure sitting on chair within large niche in wall, near a pile of bundles; two figures at R of pile; ladder to doorway at far R; tree at L
inscription:
Signature, Date, Inscription

-- in graphite on mount: [Escalier devant une maison]
-- in graphite on verso: 2570 | 1+ | 3-96 | S.13
provenance: [C. & J. Goodfriend, New York; sold November 16, 1985, to Andrus]; John E. Andrus III, Wayzata, Minn.; by descent to his daughters, Elizabeth, Katie, and Julie; gave to MIA, 2015. Earlier provenances have been gathered, but further research will increase our knowledge of their histories.
signed: signed, dated, and inscribed in plate, bottom margin: [CH. Jacque St. Come 26 7bre 1843.]
title: Stairway in Front of a House
